article_title: CVS Health Kicks Smoking Habit And Still Has Record Sales

article_metadata.description: Drugstore giant CVS Health (CVS) found kicking the smoking habit didn’t hurt sales or profits as increased prescription drug sales helped overcome the company’s decision to stop selling cigarettes and other tobacco products last year. In the company’s fourth quarter - the first full three-month period without tobacco sales -  CVS [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
